title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: LOT 1,2,3,4: Bitcoin Suisse BTC notes, Series B 2019**3131 non-denominated BTC notes produced**LOT 5,6,7,8: Bitcoin Suisse ETH notes, Series B 2019**1846 non-denominated ETH notes produced**STARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0050BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: MAY 7th, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOTIf within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED
